data.title: Distance Silapathar → South%20pole
data.meta_description: Shows the distance in kilometres between Silapathar and South%20pole and displays the route on an interactive map. Worldwide distance calculator with air line, route planner, travel duration and flight distances.
data.text:
Flight route: 2,243.44 mi (3,610.48 km) (4h 44min)

The flight distance between the nearest airports Silapathar (DAC) and South%20pole (CEB) is 2,243.44 mi (3,610.48 km). This corresponds to an approximate flight time of 4h 44min. Similar flight routes: DAC → CGY , DAC → DVO , DAC → MNL , DAC → CRK , MDL → CEB

Bearing: 122.20° (ESE)

The initial bearing on the course from Silapathar to South%20pole is 122.20° and the compass direction is ESE.

Midpoint: 19.53199,110.08772

The geographic midpoint between Silapathar and South%20pole is in 1,119.69 mi (1,801.97 km) distance between both points in a bearing of 122.20°. It is located in China, Hainan, Chengmai County (中国, 海南省, 澄迈县 / Chengmai).

Distance: 2,239.38 mi (3,603.94 km)

The shortest distance (air line) between Silapathar and South%20pole is 2,239.38 mi (3,603.94 km).

Driving route: -- ( - )

The shortest route between Silapathar and South%20pole is according to the route planner. The driving time is approx. . Half of the trip is reached in .

Time difference: 2.5h

The time difference between Silapathar (Asia/Kolkata) and South%20pole (Asia/Manila) is 2.5 hours. This means that it is now 22:55 (25.08.2024) in Silapathar and 01:25 (26.08.2024) in South%20pole.
